content.rendered:
Experience our

Indoor Swimming Pool

Introduction of Temperature Controlled Indoor Swimming Pool

Swimming is great for physical health. Kings Club Indoor Swimming Pool measures 15×8 meters and contains baby pool. It has a depth of the 2 feet, while the other one depth measures 4 feet. You can have a relaxing atmosphere at a temperature controlled swimming pool.

It can be utilized all year round. Indoor swimming pools are equipped with heating systems that enable you to control the temperature of the water to suit your requirements. We also have allocated swimming pools for kids & swimming sessions for women by lady trainer. You can find clean and hygienic changing and rest rooms with lockers.
We have packages that suit all such categories such as casual swimmer, regular swimmer or coaching student. Kings Club Indoor Swimming Pool has advanced Technology to keep the PH levels low so that you do not have any skin irritation while the water purity is well-maintained. There are certified lifeguards that guard our indoor swimming pool round the clock.
We have dedicated coaching for kids, lady coach for women, water Aerobics and exclusive ladies batch. We ensure that you always stay in a healthy zone. Our indoor swimming pool is free of UV rays because we have shades that cover up the pool. We have a team of experienced coaches that have once been international swimmers.
Temperature of water in Kings Club indoor swimming pool is perfectly maintained. We are careful about the crowd that steps into Kings club. All these facilities are available at pocket friendly prices. We have regular classes to make one a world class swimmer. We have prioritized the quality factor with great affordability.
Get ready to dive into the water to tone your body & happiness with swimming sessions at Kings Club Indoor Swimming Pool!!

Features & Benefits

Features

  • You can swim in a temperature-controlled environment.
  • Wind, rain, or other weather events keep you away from your daily swim
  • You do not need to worry about leaves, pods, & plant debris clogging the system
  • You can swim any time of day or night
  • It is a great place for a spool or swim spa which is smaller than most pools
  • It also guarantees ultimate swimming conditions year-round.
  • There are also reserved timing for women.

Benefits

  • All-time access: You can always enjoy an indoor swimming pool in any month & in any season.
  • Complete privacy: The indoor pools can be great who does not like to share a pool with other unknown people & want to spend alone time in the pool.
  • Better temperature control: You & your family can easily control the temperature of the pool water with the help of automatic pool covers & heating systems of an indoor swimming pool.
  • Less use of chemicals: Indoor pools are settled inside the structure that makes it completely sheltered from the UV rays received from direct sunlight.

Gallery

Testimonials

I am glad share my experience, Its been very good, Professional trainers, Well maintained pool and motivational thoughts. I was thinking swimming is very difficult before joining but its very very easy now...

Kiran

Very Good place to swim. Coaching is available. Coach is really good

Yogesh

Knowledgeable, very patient and encouraging coaches. We liked their attitude. Neatly maintained, advanced filtering & no chlorine. Really awesome place to swim...

Srinidhi Adiga

Very good facility for kids and adults alike to learn swimming... Very good coaches as well

Basavaraj

FAQ

1. What is a temperature controlled swimming pool?
Temperature controlled swimming pool is where the temperature of water is perfectly maintained.
2. What temperature are swimming pools kept at?
Safe temperatures for swimming pools vary with type of activity. According to the WHO, water temperatures ranging from 78 to 86 degrees Fahrenheit are generally comfortable & safe for those engaging in moderate physical activity in a pool.
3. What water temp is too cold to swim?
77-82F is the swimming pool temperature range for Olympic competition. 70F Water feels quite cold to most people. Manage any water temperature below 70F with caution. 40F or lower water is painfully cold.
4. How long does it take to heat a pool 10 degrees?
13.34 hrs of heating before the pool temperature reaches 80 degrees F. In most cases, calculations for a heat pump & heater are optimistic.
